dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.sort_date, a.s_ship_unit_gid, a.loc_code, a.cust_id, a.cust_name, a.cust_country, a.contract_id, a.shipment_id, TRIM(a.transport_id) transport_id, a.bl_date, a.commodity, a.etd, a.eta, a.weight, a.contract_price, a.total_cost, TO_CHAR((SELECT MIN(payment_date) FROM glogowner.XXSCOU_AS400_PAY_RECEIPTS_TSC WHERE (tran_id = a.transport_id OR (tran_id = SUBSTR(a.transport_id, 0, LENGTH(a.transport_id) - 1))) AND TO_DATE(bl_date,'DD-MON-YY') = TO_DATE(a.bl_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND loc_code IN ('5025','5035','5037','5332','5334','5432','5444','5333','5433','5022','5335','5038','5036','5136')),'MM/DD/YYYY') payment_date, (SELECT inv.invoice_id FROM (SELECT invoice_id, MIN(payment_date) FROM glogowner.XXSCOU_AS400_PAY_RECEIPTS_TSC WHERE (tran_id = a.transport_id OR (tran_id = SUBSTR(a.transport_id, 0, LENGTH(a.transport_id) - 1))) AND TO_DATE(bl_date,'DD-MON-YY') = TO_DATE(a.bl_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND loc_code IN ('5025','5035','5037','5332','5334','5432','5444','5333','5433','5022','5335','5038','5036','5136') GROUP BY invoice_id) inv WHERE ROWNUM = 1) invoice_number FROM (SELECT DISTINCT TO_DATE(ssurem1.remark_text, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sort_date, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssur1.refnum_value loc_code, loc.location_xid cust_id, loc.location_name cust_name, loc.country_code3_gid cust_country, oob.order_base_xid contract_id, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, (CASE WHEN NOT ssur2.refnum_value IS NULL THEN ssur2.refnum_value WHEN NOT ssur3.refnum_value IS NULL THEN ssur3.refnum_value WHEN NOT ssur4.refnum_value IS NULL THEN ssur4.refnum_value ELSE ' ' END) transport_id, ssurem1.remark_text bl_date, (SELECT LISTAGG(itm.packaged_item_xid, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY itm.packaged_item_xid) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT pi.packaged_item_xid FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) itm) commodity, (CASE WHEN s.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(s.start_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(utc.get_local_date(s.start_time,s.source_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') END) etd, (CASE WHEN s.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(s.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(utc.get_local_date(s.end_time,s.dest_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') END) eta, ROUND(ssu.unit_weight_base / 2204.62262,3) weight, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(obref.ob_refnum_value),2) contract_price, ROUND(ROUND(ssu.unit_weight_base / 2204.62262,3) * TO_NUMBER(ROUND(obref.ob_refnum_value,2)),2) total_cost FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.TRUCK ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid IN ('SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID','SCOULAR/FOOD.CONTAINER ID') LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur4 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur4.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur4.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.RAIL CAR ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_remark ssurem1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssurem1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssurem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TRAN ID DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref ON oob.order_base_gid = obref.order_base_gid AND obref.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL OR (NOT :CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL AND sip.involved_party_contact_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_ID,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_ID, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) AND (:CUSTOMER_COUNTRY IS NULL OR (NOT :CUSTOMER_COUNTRY IS NULL AND loc.country_code3_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_COUNTRY,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_COUNTRY, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)))) a ORDER BY a.cust_id, a.sort_date
